analysis.description:
iGniter.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/28/0xa70f4fecbe032135ad970dceeb9e5076a5be8b1d.sol#257-338) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- iGniter.minedBlocks
	- iGniter.availableAmount
	- iGniter.INRdividends
	- iGniter.availableBalance

iGniter.name (/unique_chucks/28/0xa70f4fecbe032135ad970dceeb9e5076a5be8b1d.sol#338-343) is declared view but changes state variables:

	- iGniter.decimals
